abstract: Watching the season change in Litchfield County's small towns doesn't have to break the bank.
snippet: Watching the season change in Litchfield County's small towns doesn't have to break the bank.
lead_paragraph: A J's Steak and Pizza might be intimidating, I was told - kind of a bikers' bar. But the burgers were cheap and good, the peanuts were free, the place was still open and it was right down the road from the room where I had just dropped my bags.

headline.main: Litchfield County, Easy on the Wallet
